oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hope letter, Aug. 1820
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thomas Hope
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Thomas Hope, Rossville, letter to wife Elizabeth Hope, Knoxville, TN. August 20, 1820. ALS 1 p. Mentions his poor health.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence;
